title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.2 - Rendering account for client
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.2 - Rendering account for client

State Regulations
A real estate broker shall, within a reasonable time, render an account to his client and remit to him, any monies collected for his
client, and unexpended for his account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
175.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
